CHANGES
=======

- 2012/12/07 - version 0.3.1
----------------------------

- import zmq.Poller instead of zmq.core.Poller (fix readthedocs build)

--------------------------

- fix polling
- fix message encoding
- add pub/sub example and tests

- fix license headers
- fix doc typos

2012/11/07 - version 0.1.0

Initial release
